ti_sci_msg_resp_get_device_state Struct Reference

#include <pmhal_ti_sci.h>

Detailed Description

struct ti_sci_msg_resp_get_device_state - Response to get device request. : Generic header : Indicates how many times the device has lost context. A driver can use this monotonic counter to determine if the device has lost context since the last time this message was exchanged. : Programmed state of the reset lines. : The state as programmed by set_device.

  • Uses the MSG_DEVICE_SW_* macros : The actual state of the hardware.

Response to request TI_SCI_MSG_GET_DEVICE_STATE.
